name: Defense to lien by claimants
text:
Any person having an interest in the property held by a lienor under section 507-18 may intervene in the action. [L 1921, c 131, §3; RL 1925, §2906; RL 1935, §4373; RL 1945, §8777; RL 1955, §193-23; HRS ; am L 1972, c 106, §1(d)]
Rules of Court
  Intervention, see HRCP rule 24.
  Necessary joinder of parties, see HRCP rule 19(b).
